feed.title: WeddingShare Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WeddingShare: v1.6.5
entry.content:
Added

  • Added the GALLERY_QR_CODE_INCLUDE_CULTURE environment variable to allow users to include/exclude the culture settings in the QR code.
  • Added the sponsors badge to give the people that help fund this project some credit.

Changed

  • Updated to a new logo that is not owned by a third party.

Removed

  • Removed the footer attribution for Freepik - Flaticon as the logo is no longer used.

Changelog - https://github.com/Cirx08/WeddingShare/compare/1.6.4...1.6.5

entry.title: New release for WeddingShare: v1.6.6
entry.content:
Added

  • Added different user levels and item owners. Users can be set as Basic, Moderator, Admin, Owner. - https://docs.wedding-share.org/docs/user_levels

Changes

  • Removed the password inputs from the user edit popup and moved to it's own popup to allow for better separation of permissions and so that a new password does not need to be set if changing the email etc.

Fixed

  • Fixed a bug in the password reset that was preventing changes from taking effect.

Changelog - https://github.com/Cirx08/WeddingShare/compare/1.6.5...1.6.6

entry.title: New release for WeddingShare: v1.6.7
entry.content:
Changes

  • Enabled the Escape (Esc) key to hide popups on keyup.
  • Migrated the /Admin controller endpoint to /Account to reduce confusion as there are now different user types other than admins.

Changelog - https://github.com/Cirx08/WeddingShare/compare/1.6.6...1.6.7

entry.title: New release for WeddingShare: v1.6.7.1
entry.content:
Changes

  • Updated Italian translations based on the changes provided by CoffeePerry.

Changelog - https://github.com/Cirx08/WeddingShare/compare/1.6.7...1.6.7.1

entry.title: New release for WeddingShare: v1.6.8
entry.content:
Changes

  • Moved thumbnails from a single master directory into smaller gallery level directories.

Changelog - https://github.com/Cirx08/WeddingShare/compare/1.6.7...1.6.8
